field.label: Background Image
field.comment: Allowed file types: JPEG (JPG), PNG, GIF. The image will only be displayed on desktop devices (to reduce overall page height on mobile devices).

field.label: Enable Custom Colors
field.tooltip: If you want to apply the different Color Scheme per store views please follow our guide.
field.comment: 'bin/magento setup:upgrade && bin/magento setup:static-content:deploy' command must be run in the console when any of the settings in the fields below have been changed.

field.label: Color Scheme Presets
field.tooltip: Please click on the Apply button to check the presents colors. To apply them to your store view, click on the Save button.

field.label: Primary Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of all primary buttons (e.g., Add to Cart, Create An Account and Sign In on Hover)

field.label: Secondary Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of some secondary buttons and links on hover effect (e.g., Sing In and Checkout buttons in Minicart)

field.label: Outline Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of all outline buttons and the Back To Top button

field.label: Primary Font Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of all primary and selected text

field.label: Secondary Text Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of all secondary and unselected text

field.label: Alternative Background Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the header block with the login/sign In and store/currency switcher links

field.label: URL color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the links and Sticky Compare badge

field.label: Placeholder Text Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the placeholder text in inputs

field.label: Special Price Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the special price and counter in the mini cart.

field.label: Small Buttons Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the links on hover in the header block (e.g., Store and Currency Switcher links)

field.label: Small Buttons Highlight Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the Social Icons on hover, Pagination button on hover on Category Page, and Close button on hover in the Add to Cart pop-up

field.label: Generic Notification Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the warning messages

field.label: Generic Notification Text Color
field.tooltip: The following setting affects the color of the text in the warning messages
